name: [GD] AWS CloudTrail Log Suspended
description: Identifies suspending the recording of AWS API calls and log file delivery for the specified trail. An adversary may suspend trails in an attempt to evade defenses.
note: The AWS Filebeat module must be enabled to use this rule.
author: Elastic
false_positives: Suspending the recording of a trail may be done by a system or network administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Trail suspensions from unfamiliar users or hosts should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
query: event.action:StopLogging and event.dataset:aws.cloudtrail and event.provider:cloudtrail.amazonaws.com and event.outcome:success
